questions.question: Ese koperative ifite ubuzima gatozi?
questions.recommendation: Cooperative Igomba Kuba ifite Ubuzima Gatozi

questions.question: Ni ayahe mazina ya perezida wa koperative?
Ni iyihe nomero ya telefone ya perezida wa koperative?
Koperative yatangiranye n'abanyamuryango b'abagabo bangahe ?
Koperative yatangiranye n'abanyamuryango b'abagore bangahe?
questions.recommendation: 30% by' abanyamurayango shingiro bagomba kuba ari abagore

questions.question: Bituma umubare w'abanyamuryango shingiro uba
Ese ubu koperative igizwe n'abanyamuryango b'abagabo bangahe ?
Ese ubu koperative igizwe n'abanyamuryango b'abagore bangahe ?
questions.recommendation: 30% by'abanyamuryango rusange bagomba kuba ari abagore

questions.question: Bituma umubare w'abanyamuryango w'ubu uba
questions.recommendation: Abanyamuryango rusange bagize koperative bagomba kuba bangana cg bari hejuru y'abanyamuryango shingiro

questions.question: Mwaba mwarakoze inama rusange muri werurwe na Ukwakira ?
questions.recommendation: Koperative Igomba gukora Inama rusange mu kwa Werurwe na Ukwakira.

questions.question: Haba hari ishusho y'umutungo(imari) yagaragajwe mu nama yo muri werurwe?
questions.recommendation: Ishusho y'umutungo igomba kugaragazwa mu nteko Rusange yo muri Werurwe

questions.question: Ese mufite inyandiko mvugo z'inama zose zabaye za koperative?
questions.recommendation: Mugomba kubika Inyandiko mvugo z'inama zose za Koperative

questions.question: Koperative ifite komite y'inama y'ubutegetsi?
questions.recommendation: Koperative Igomba Kugira komite y'inama y'ubutegetsi

questions.question: Komite y'inama y'ubutegitsi igizwe n'abanyamuryango b'abagabo bangahe ?
Komite y'inama y'ubutegitsi igizwe n'abanyamuryango b'abagore bangahe  ?
Bituma umubare rusange wa Komite y'inama y'ubutegitsi uba
questions.recommendation: Komite y'inama y'ubutegetsi igomba kuba igizwe na abanyamuryango bangana cg barenga 5 kandi umubare wabo ugomba kuba ari igiharwe.

questions.question: Bituma ku ijana umubare wa abagore bagize inama y'ubutegetsi uba
questions.recommendation: 30% by'abagize komite y'inama y'ubutegetsi bagomba kuba ari abagore

questions.question: Komite y'inama y'ubutegetsi imaze guterana kangahe muri uyu mwaka?
questions.recommendation: Komite y'inama y'ubutegetsi igomba guhura nibura rimwe mu gihembwe

questions.question: Koperative ifite komite ngenzuzi igizwe n'abanyamuryango 3 batowe n'inteko rusange?
questions.recommendation: Koperative Igomba kugira Komite ngenzuzi

questions.question: Inama ya komite ngenzuzi imaze guterana kangahe muri uyu mwaka?
questions.recommendation: Komite ngenzuzi igomba guhura nibura rimwe mu gihembwe

questions.question: Komite y'inama y'ubutegetsi imaze manda zingahe ku ubuyobozi?
questions.recommendation: Manda za komite y'inama y'ubutegetsi ntizigomba kurenga ebyiri

questions.question: Komite ngenzuzi imaze manda Zingahe kubuyobozi?
questions.recommendation: Manda za komite ngenzuzi ntizigomba kurenga ebyiri

questions.question: Abakozi ba Koperative baba bafite amasezereno yanditse bijyanye n'amategeko ya koperative ndetse n'ay'umurimo?
questions.recommendation: Abakozi ba Koperative bagomba kugira amasezerano yanditse akubiyemo amategeko ya koperative ndetse na ayumurimo

questions.question: Ese koperative ifite ishusho y'umutungo y'umwaka ushize?
questions.recommendation: Koperative igomba kugira ishusho y'umutungo y'umwaka ushize

questions.question: Ese koperative ifite raporo y'ubugenzuzi bw'igenda y'umwaka ushize?
questions.recommendation: Koperative igomba kugira raporo y'ubugenzuzi bw'igenda y'umwaka ushize

questions.question: Ese Koperative ifite nyandiko zemewe n'amategeko?
Muri izi nyandiko zemewe na amategeko zikurikira,koperative ifitemo izihe?
options: kopi y’Itegeko rigenga amakoperative mu Rwanda
amategeko agenga imyitwarire y’abayobozi ba koperative n’abakozi bayo
questions.recommendation: Koperative igomba kugira inyandiko zose zemewe n'amategeko nkuko biteganywa n'amategeko agenga koperative

questions.question: Ese Koperative ifite uburyo bwo kubika inyandiko zijyanye no gucunga Umutungo?
Ni ubuhe uburyo  bukurikira bwo kubika inyandiko zijyanye no gucunga Umutungo?
questions.recommendation: Koperative igomba kuba ifite inyandiko z'icungamutungo zose(Igitabo cy'imikoreshereze y'amafaranga,Igitabo cyandikwamo Ikawa yakiriwe , Igitabo Cyandikwamo Ikawa y'amaganda, Igitabo cy'imibyizi ya abakozi)

questions.question: Mu isizeni ishize, ni igishoro kingana iki ku ijana (%) cyakoreshejwe mu kugura ibitumbwe mu bahinzi?
questions.recommendation: Nibura 80% by'amafaranga y'igishoro agomba kuba yarashowe mu kugura ibitumbwe

questions.question: Mu isizeni ishize,Ikigereranyo cy'ikawa y'igitumbwe ku kawa ya amaganda cyanganaga gite?(Ni ibiro bingahe by'ikawa y'ibitumbwe  bivamo ikiro kimwe y'amaganda
questions.recommendation: Ikigereranyo cy'ikawa y'igitumbwe ku kawa ya amaganda kigomba kuba kiri hagati ya 4.9 na 5.5
